tool_description: The number #1  API for acquiring sources for climate change news from around the world!
name: D1app-Climate-Change
title: D1app-Climate-Change

api_list.name: GET Specific Climate Change News
api_list.description: Retrieve climate change news from sources all over the world!
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://d1app-climate-change.p.rapidapi.com/news/thetimes"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "d1app-climate-change.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://d1app-climate-change.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

print(response.json())
